import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update organization user by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/organizations/users/{OrganizationUserId}/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a single organization-user relationship by OrganizationUserId. Use this endpoint when you need to change the OrganizationId or UserId on an existing relationship and you have the specific relationship ID.

**Prerequisites**
1. **OrganizationUserId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/users/query](/docs/api/organizations/get-organization-users-by-query-get) and extract `Items[].OrganizationUserId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Query for the relationship and capture OrganizationUserId.
2. Submit [PUT /api/v1.0/organizations/users/\{OrganizationUserId\}/update](/docs/api/organizations/update-organization-user) with the fields to update.

**Minimal Required Fields**: OrganizationUserId path parameter plus the fields you intend to update (OrganizationId or UserId).

**Notes**: This API version is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"OrganizationUserId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating an organization-user relationship.","properties":{"OrganizationUserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"OrganizationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"UserId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}},"title":"UpdateOrganizationUserRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
